channel.description: Recent content in Pages on PonyFest

item.title: About
item.description: About PonyFest Online! Right! We know what you’re thinking: What the hay is PonyFest Online? Where did you come from? This wasn’t a thing a week ago! You’d be right! PonyFest Online is an online Pony Convention with a one week turnaround - Our entire organization, schedule, everything has been built this week! We were inspired by Ruef’s awesome online Vendor Hall for our friends and family who’ve been directly hurt by the loss of in-person pony conventions.

item.title: Staff
item.description: Staff Coordination Katharine Berry - Princess Events Simul - Lead Lycan - Music Lead Foal Papers - Staff A/V Larscis - Lead Alex (Coach) - Staff Reiuiji - Staff winter501st - Staff winchester572 - Staff Gaming Leslie - Lead Tabletop Eliwood Sain - Lead Design TechyCutie - Lead Dawnfire - Bit Rate’s Mom Amodwithoutamark - Staff Leh - Staff Twisted Sketch - Staff Viwrastupr - Staff Social Media Kevin from TrotCon - Lead Vendors Ruef - Lead B.
